scripts.prepush: echo There should be additional layer of checks
scripts.bucket: aws s3api create-bucket --bucket shopify.datastack.de --region eu-central-1 --create-bucket-configuration LocationConstraint=eu-central-1
scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file build/output.yaml --s3-bucket shopify.datastack.de
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file build/output.yaml --stack-name shopify-auth-service-cognito --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.qd: npm run folder && npm run package && npm run deploy
